OOC: Orchid, Termitron is inside the base, in a room.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
> Birdbot and Papertron still waited for one of their 3 most hated 
enemies. Lee and Barrymore continued to brutally beat the now 
unconscious Brown and Pink while they both were bleeding to death. 
White struggled to breath as it was getting harder every second. 
McGowan and Virgo smiled, waiting for Trinity, while Alba smoked a 
cigarette. Hazel stares.
> 
> Hazel: Well, they can be replaced I suppose. It's easy to find a 
few idiots.
> 
> Bronze: Yes. I just wish I could have kicked some ass.
> 
> Cerulean: There's too many of them.
> 
> Bronze: How about we go in?
> 
> Hazel: Very good suggestion, Bronze.
> 
> Bronze: I'm cool.
> 
> Hazel walks back into the Chivtron base, followed by Cerulean and 
Bronze. Periwinkle quickly follows after Hazel waves to Termitron and 
leans against the wall near the entrance with Cerulean, Bronze and 
Periwinkle. They started a conversation...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: airly2000 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Saturday, January 12, 2002 12:41 AM
>   Subject: Re: I hope the Chivtrons are ready!
> 
> 
>   Nightlight:
> 
>   Nightlight heard the noises and she felt scared, she took in arms 
at 
>   Trinity and move close to Aerotaur, while Termitron ran towards 
the 
>   room's door and stopped infront of  it ready toopen fire if some 
one 
>   tried to came in
> 
>   "What's that !!!???"said tembled Nightlight to Aerotaur
> 
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "*Orchid*" <ilovealllizards@p...> wrote:
>   > Birdbot and Paper stop in front of the Chivtron base. McGowan, 
>   Virgo, Barrymore, Lee, Depp and Alba walk up behind the two.
>   > 
>   > McGowan: Hey!
>   > 
>   > Birdbot looks at McGowan.
>   > 
>   > Birdbot: Rah rah....
>   > 
>   > McGowan scoffs and ignores Birdbot.
>   > 
>   > Virgo: Hey! All you sorry sons a bitches! You ready to rock!?!?
>   > 
>   > Hazel walks out of her room and near the entrance. She hears 
>   Virgo's yelling and gasps. Her gasp was a gasp a glee and joy.
>   > 
>   > Hazel: Cerulean! Bronze! Come here!
>   > 
>   > Cerulean and Bronze stop in the hall and walk up to Hazel.
>   > 
>   > Hazel: You guys, a fight! Isn't this great!
>   > 
>   > Cerulean smirks and runs off to get the others together.
>   > 
>   > Bronze: This is great! Some asses to kick!
>   > 
>   > Hazel: I've been waiting for this. We'll be the firsts out 
there.
>   > 
>   > Bronze: We get the most action!
>   > 
>   > Hazel: The most scars!
>   > 
>   > Cerulean leads Periwinkle, Pink White and Brown over to Hazel 
and 
>   Bronze.
>   > 
>   > Cerulean: Ready.
>   > 
>   > Hazel sends Periwinkle, Pink, White and Brown out first and 
her, 
>   Cerulean and Bronze slowly step out.
>   > 
>   > Virgo: Look at this. Look at this.
>   > 
>   > Virgo laughs while pointing at Pink running towards her. Virgo 
>   allows Pink's shots to hit. She trips Pink and catches her. She 
>   brutally beats down at Pink with one fist and spins her around, 
>   powerbombing her ontop of several sharp rocks. Virgo climbs to 
her 
>   feet. Pink gasps, not able to breath form the shock and pain. She 
>   squirms around, clutching at the rock impaled in her back. Hazel 
>   stares at Virgo's cold smile. Hazel laughs some, at the same time 
>   McGowan laughs.
>   > 
>   > Hazel: Go.
>   > 
>   > Brown begins running. Depp begins walking. Brown lets out a 
battle 
>   cry while Depp laughs some. Brown begins firing his gun at Depp 
as 
>   they became dangerously close. Depp swings his sword. Brown 
stares in 
>   horror as his hand drops to the ground. Depp raises a gun and 
shoots 
>   Brown in the head. He collapses. McGowan raises a hand, signaling 
for 
>   Virgo and Depp to step back. They follow her orders and stand 
beside 
>   her. Birdbot and Papertron haven't attacked yet. They were 
waiting 
>   for Aerotaur, Nightlight and Trinity. Virgo was also waiting for 
that 
>   certain someone.
>   > 
>   > Virgo: Furry bitch furry bitch....Gonna be so frigging dead....
>   > 
>   > Hazel, White and Periwinkle begin walking towards the 
attackers. 
>   Birdbot's eyes change color. Then, without warning, he flies at 
>   Hazel. She gasps and grabs White, pulling her in front of 
herself, 
>   for protection. Birdbot digs his talons into White's chest. After 
>   several cracks, his feet bust through White's back and start 
trying 
>   to grab Hazel, but can't reach. He rips his feet back out of 
White, 
>   sending blood flying. Hazel blocks a fleet of shots from McGowan 
with 
>   White before dropping her. White stares, wide eyed. Her fingers 
>   twitch as she lays on the ground. Hazel looks at McGowan, whose 
smile 
>   had brightened. Hazel runs back over to Cerulean, Bronze and 
>   Periwinkle.
>   > 
>   > Hazel: Damn, their good. I've got to admit that.
>   > 
>   > Hazel watches Lee and Barrymore brutally kick Pink and Brown 
while 
>   a puddle of blood forms around White.
>   > 
>   > Bronze: Maybe I'll kick ass another day...
>   > 
>   > Papertron: ERF FER FER FER!...
>   > 
>   > Papertron flexes while Birdbot demands Doritos...
> 
> 
>
